feed.title: Protocol changes for SPV clients: mempool, getdata commands

entry.title: Protocol changes for SPV clients: mempool, getdata commands
entry.summary: Jeff Garzik proposed a small change to the protocol for the upcoming release of satoshi client v0.7, which involves adding a 'mempool' P2P command and extending 'getdata' behavior. Wladimir fully agrees with the changes but suggests that a small BIP should be created for consistency and to document it for other client developers.
